name: tariffcomponents
description:
Provides insides into the different cost components of energy for a private household.
Sample Request: https://api.corrently.io/v2.0/tariff/components?email=demo%40corrently.io&zip=69168&kwha=3300

zipcode.description: Zipcode (Postzleitzahl) of a city in Germany.

email.description: Valid email address to assign request to (pre offer generation). Ensure GDPR (DSGVO) at any time

kwha.description: Total amount of energy in kilo-watt-hours per year. (sample 2100)

milliseconds.description: If provided all results will be scaled to this timeframe

wh.description: If provided together with milliseconds, a cost component stament for a particular event (like charging a car) will be created.

$ul: **describtion**: What is this price component about
**per**: Single unit price multiyplier is based on
**sum**: Total sum in Euro for this price component.
